EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to respond to customer if they ask why product was shipped early (prior to rejecting product)
EmailTemplate.name: RMA Early Shipment
EmailTemplate.subject: Response to Early Shipment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case number: <Enter Customer CASE#>
Per Honeywellâ€™s conditions of sale (located at myaerospace.honeywell.com), product may be shipped when material is available, potentially before requested delivery date. If this product is returned, it will be considered a cancellation and subject to 20% restocking fee of $____. You would have to resubmit the order at lead time.
If you have any questions regarding this policy, please contact your Customer Support Manager.
Purchase Order Number: <Enter Customer PO#> Sales Order Number: <Enter SAP SO#>
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
